Package com.soa.auth.callback

Interface Summary
IBinaryTokenCallback This Callback is used to retrieve an arbitrary binary token or a specific type of binary token.
ICertificateCallback This is the Callback interface for collecting a X509 certificate chain.
IDomainCallback This is the Callback interface for collecting domain information
IKerberosTokenCallback This callback class is used to retrieve/set Kerberos token.
IResourceCallback This is the Callback interface for collecting resource information
ISAMLCallback This is the Callback interface for collecting SAML assertion.
IServiceSubjectCallback This is the callback interface for getting the Subject associated with a service
ISiteMinderSessionCallback This is the Callback interface for collecting the SiteMinder authentication session results
ISSOTokenCallback This is the Callback interface for collecting the Single Sign On token that was issued by a third-party authentication source.
ISubjectCallback This is the Callback interface for collecting Subject information.
 

Class Summary
BinaryTokenCallback This is the default implementation of IBinaryTokenCallback.
CertificateCallback This is a default implementation of ICertificateCallbackfor collecting Certificate object
CookieCallback This is the Callback object for collecting cookie credential.
DomainCallback This is the default implementation of IDomainCallback object for collecting domain principal a user belongs to.
DomainListCallback This is the Callback object for collecting the list of domains that should be used to make authentication call.
EmailCallback  
HttpRequestCallback  
KerberosTokenCallback This is the default implementation of IKerberosTokenCallback for collecting Kerberos token.
LoginParametersCallback  
LoginProcessDriverCallback  
ResourceCallback This is the default implemenation of IResourceCallback
SAML20Callback  
SAMLCallback This is the default implementation of ISAMLCallback.
ServiceSubjectCallback This is the default implementation of IServiceSubjectCallback.
SiteMinderSessionCallback This is the default implemenation of ISiteMinderSessionCallback.
SSOTokenCallback This is the default implemenation of ISSOTokenCallback
SubjectCallback This is the default implemenation of ISubjectCallback.
